name: TOTEM: Légende Africaine (Version PC)
description:
In african culture a ''Totem''is what defines your clan, your history or your origins. Some people use it in order to summon a mystical strength or deity. 

Not all people can use it except the chosen ones.

Kiaku is a ''Totem Warrior'' who can unleash his ''Totem''. But he has to Defeat Muluba his rival.

Help Kiaku to save his family by fighting with his ''Totem''. African mythology and environments this is what this game is all about. Enjoy !
